title: Textile, 1980-33-7
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave
creditline: Museum purchase from Textile Department Fund
description:
Part of length of fabric with a straight repeat which includes classical figured and Romsy-style ruins.
Monochrome purple.
Length of repeat: 46 cm (18")

exhibitions.title: Color by the Yard: Printed Fabrics from 1760-1860
